name: Adam
story: The first man, created by God in Eden.

name: Eve
story: The first woman, mother of all the living.

name: Cain
story: Son of Adam and Eve, killed his brother Abel.

name: Abel
story: Son of Adam and Eve, offered a righteous sacrifice.

name: Seth
story: Son of Adam, ancestor of Noah.

name: Noah
story: Built the Ark and survived the Flood.

name: Shem
story: Son of Noah, ancestor of Abraham.

name: Ham
story: Son of Noah, father of Canaan.

name: Japheth
story: Son of Noah, ancestor of many nations.

name: Abraham
story: Father of nations; God’s covenant with him.

name: Sarah
story: Wife of Abraham, mother of Isaac.

name: Lot
story: Nephew of Abraham; fled Sodom.

name: Isaac
story: Son of Abraham, father of Jacob and Esau.

name: Rebekah
story: Wife of Isaac, mother of Jacob and Esau.

name: Jacob (Israel)
story: Father of the 12 tribes of Israel.

name: Esau
story: Brother of Jacob, ancestor of Edomites.

name: Joseph
story: Dreamer, betrayed by brothers, rose in Egypt.

name: Levi
story: Son of Jacob; ancestor of Levites.

name: Judah
story: Son of Jacob; tribe of kings and Messiah.

name: Moses
story: Led Israel from Egypt; received Ten Commandments.

name: Aaron
story: Brother of Moses; Israel’s first high priest.

name: Miriam
story: Sister of Moses; prophetess who sang after the Red Sea.

name: Joshua
story: Succeeded Moses, led Israel into Promised Land.

name: Caleb
story: Faithful spy who trusted God’s promise.

name: Samuel
story: Prophet and judge; anointed Saul and David.

name: Saul
story: First king of Israel, later rejected by God.

name: Jonathan
story: Son of Saul, loyal friend of David.

name: David
story: Shepherd who became king; wrote many psalms.

name: Bathsheba
story: Wife of David, mother of Solomon.

name: Solomon
story: King known for wisdom; built the Temple.

name: Rehoboam
story: Son of Solomon, king during kingdom’s division.

name: Elijah
story: Prophet taken up to heaven in a whirlwind.

name: Elisha
story: Prophet who performed many miracles.

name: Isaiah
story: Prophet who foretold the Messiah.

name: Jeremiah
story: The weeping prophet, warned of exile.

name: Ezekiel
story: Prophet who saw visions of God’s glory.

name: Daniel
story: Survived the lions’ den through faith.

name: Shadrach
story: One of three men saved from the fiery furnace.

name: Meshach
story: One of three men saved from the fiery furnace.

name: Abednego
story: One of three men saved from the fiery furnace.

name: Nehemiah
story: Rebuilt Jerusalem’s walls after exile.

name: Ezra
story: Priest who restored the Law after exile.

name: Job
story: Tested by suffering but remained faithful.

name: Ruth
story: Moabite woman of faith, ancestor of David.

name: Esther
story: Queen who saved her people from destruction.

name: Deborah
story: Prophetess and judge who led Israel.

name: Gideon
story: Judge who defeated Midian with few men.

name: Samson
story: Judge with great strength, defeated Philistines.

name: Hannah
story: Mother of Samuel, prayed earnestly to God.
